name: European Foundation For Financial Inclusion
goal:
The organisation promotes financial inclusion, i.e. access for all to a choice of basic and affordable banking and payment services and to a wide range of financial services including credit, savings schemes and insurance, such as are essential for integration into modern society at any given time.
The organisation has suspended activities for the time being.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market
euInitiatives: Financial Services, particularly as they relate to those at the risk of exclusion or restricted access to such services. s
